item.title: M1 Media Programming: Web Technology
item.description: Welcome! This pages introduce you to the web application part of the “Epochenunterricht” in M1 Mediaprogramming. The Epochenunterricht consists of 3 x 5 laboratory sessions for the three study focuses Web Technology, Visual Computing and Game Technology respectively. Have a look at the tentative overall schedule to see how this breaks down. What we will do Within the five weeks of Web Technology, you will work on your own Web Application Project in a more or less agile manner.
